#Java sources are taken from:
http://hg.openjdk.java.net/code-tools/jmh/file/tip/jmh-samples

#Maven project is generated by:
mvn archetype:generate \
  -DinteractiveMode=false \
  -DarchetypeGroupId=org.openjdk.jmh \
  -DarchetypeArtifactId=jmh-java-benchmark-archetype \
  -DgroupId=org.sample \
  -DartifactId=test \
  -Dversion=1.0

#Build and run by command line:
mvn clean install
java -jar target/benchmarks.jar

#Build and run by IDE:
All classes have the main method
